meta.title: me:ping
meta.desc: A command to check how long it took to receive/send a message.

sections.section: This command can check how long it took to receive/send a message.

No.1: When the command was sent. No.2: When the command was executed. No.3: When the first message was sent.
Receive is No.2-No.1 and Sent is No.3-No.2.
